title: The Animal shelf
subject_group: Literature/Children's literature - Film and video adaptations
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television programs for children
description: Join the animals on Timothy's animal shelf- Stripey, Getup, Gumpa, Little Mut and Woeful as they embark on a series of exciting adventures. Based on the books by Ivy Wallace and adapted for television by Julia and Chris Allen.  Hottest Day of the Year (310725) Stripey to the Rescue (310728) Music in the Woods (310729) The Mystery of the Pictures (310730) Little Mut Goes Flying (310731)
